segments.text: Hey , John ! I haven ’ t seen you in ages ! What ’ s new ? What have you been up to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pete ! Nice to see you Well , on top the norm , you know , wife and kids and work , I ’ Ve actually gotten into doing some trading .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Trading ? You , big guy ? What are you trading ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Currencies ? As in Euros , Dollars , Pounds and Rupees ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s called Forex . Foreign Exchange . The great thing about it is that I don ’ t have to invest a huge amount . I put in a margin deposit and then I can buy and sell up to 100 times that much !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t understand . You ’ re buying and selling money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You got it ! Just last night I made USD 150 !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah ! It ’ s a 24 hour market ! I had bought some RIB earlier at a low asking price but last night it appreciated drastically so I made a split second decision and sold all my RIB at an amazing bid ! I ’
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re kidding ! I ’ m on ! Where do I sign up ?
segments.speaker: S1
